languages.text: "Телесные наказания — один из самых действенных методов укрощения несанкционированных ксеносов. Мне было любопытно, подействует ли он на друкари".
"Corporal punishment is one of the most effective methods of subduing unsanctioned xenos. I was curious if it would work on Drukhari."
languages.original_text: "Телесные наказания — один из самых действенных методов укрощения несанкционированных ксеносов. Мне было любопытно, подействует ли он на друкари".

traits.locale_text: "Corporal punishment is one of the most effective methods of subduing unsanctioned xenos. I was curious if it would work on Drukhari."
"Corporal punishment is one of the most effective methods of subduing unsanctioned xenos. I was curious if it would work on Drukhari."
"Corporal punishment is one of the most effective methods of subduing unsanctioned xenos. I was curious if it would work on Drukhari."
"Corporal punishment is one of the most effective methods of subduing unsanctioned xenos. I was curious if it would work on Drukhari."

languages.text: “对非法异形而言，体罚是最有效的驯服方式。不知道这种手段对黑暗灵族是否有效。”
languages.original_text: "Corporal punishment is one of the most effective methods of subduing unsanctioned xenos. I was curious if it would work on Drukhari."

languages.text: «Los castigos físicos son uno de los métodos más eficaces para someter a los xenos no autorizados. Me preguntaba si funcionaría con Drukhari».
languages.original_text: "Corporal punishment is one of the most effective methods of subduing unsanctioned xenos. I was curious if it would work on Drukhari."

languages.text: « Le châtiment corporel est l'une des méthodes les plus efficaces pour soumettre les xénos non autorisés. Je me demandais si cela fonctionnerait sur les Drukharis. »
languages.original_text: "Corporal punishment is one of the most effective methods of subduing unsanctioned xenos. I was curious if it would work on Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: « Le châtiment corporel est l'une des méthodes les plus efficaces pour soumettre les xénos non autorisés. Je me demandais si cela fonctionnerait sur les Drukharis. »

languages.text: "Körperliche Züchtigung ist eine der effizientesten Methoden der Unterwerfung unsanktionierter Xenos. Ich war neugierig, wie sie bei Drukhari wirken würde."
languages.original_text: "Corporal punishment is one of the most effective methods of subduing unsanctioned xenos. I was curious if it would work on Drukhari."

languages.text: 「肉体的な懲罰は、未認可の異種族を制圧するうえでの最も効果的な手法の1つ。それがデュカーリに効くか、興味があったの」
languages.original_text: "Corporal punishment is one of the most effective methods of subduing unsanctioned xenos. I was curious if it would work on Drukhari."

languages.text: "Fiziksel ceza, onaysız zenoları hizaya getirmenin en etkili yöntemlerindendir. Drukharilerde işe yarayıp yaramayacağını merak ediyordum."
languages.original_text: "Corporal punishment is one of the most effective methods of subduing unsanctioned xenos. I was curious if it would work on Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: "Fiziksel ceza, onaysız zenoları hizaya getirmenin en etkili yöntemlerindendir. Drukharilerde işe yarayıp yaramayacağını merak ediyordum."
